All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Ball
An abstract Ball class that is responsible to create the ball face and set the position, speed, colour of the ball.
BallFactory
A ball factory that return a ball object based on the ball type.
Brick
An abstract brick class that is responsible to make brick face, to check the brick broken status, to repair the brick, to find and set impact and to set the color of the brick.
BrickFactory
A brick factory that returns a brick object based on the brick type.
CementBrick
A cement brick class that inherits abstract brick class.
CementBrickTest
 
ClayBrick
A clay brick class that inherits from the abstract brick class.
ClayBrickTest
 
Crack
A crack class that is responsible to make a crack on the cement brick.
CrackTest
 
DebugConsole
A debug console class that sets the location of the debug console panel.
DebugConsoleController
A debugConsole controller class that controls debugConsole Class.
DebugPanel
A debug panel class that draws the debug panel on the screen.
GameBoard
A game board class that draws the game on the screen.
GameBoardController
A GameBoard Controller class that controls gameBoard class.
GameFrame
A game frame class that holds the home menu and game board.
GameFrameController
A gameFrame controller class that controls the game frame class.
GameInfo
A game info class that shows the instructions on how to play the game.
GameInfoController
A GameInfo Controller class that controls the gameInfo class.
GameScore
A game score class that is responsible to reset the game score in rank mode.
GameTimer
A game timer class that makes a countdown timer in rank mode.
GraphicsMain
The main class that runs the entire game.
HighScoreController
A high score controller class that controls the high score class.
HighScoreView
A high score view class that shows the high score leaderboard.
HomeMenu
A home menu class that shows the home menu of the game.
HomeMenuController
A home menu controller class that controls the home menu class.
Level
A level class that is responsible to make levels of games, to switch to next level and to check whether there is any more levels left.
LevelTest
 
MagicBrick
A magic brick class that inherits from the abstract brick class.
MagicBrickTest
 
Player
A player class that is responsible to move left/right to catch the ball.
PlayerTest
 
RubberBall
A rubber ball class that inherits from the abstract ball class.
RubberBallTest
 
SteelBrick
A steel brick class that inherits from the abstract brick class.
SteelBrickTest
 
Wall
A wall class that is responsible to set and get the state of the level, player, ball and bricks.
WallTest
